articles.author: David Chau
articles.title: ASX sinks to three-week low, Wall Street and European markets fall on recession signals - ABC News
articles.description: The Australian share market has wiped out all of its gains for the month, on growing fears that central bank efforts to tame rising consumer prices with inflation-busting interest-rate hikes will weaken the global economy and lead to a recession.
